longBusinessSummary: Asseco Poland S.A. develops and sells software products primarily in Poland, rest of Europe, the United States, Israel, Africa, and internationally. The company offers software and IT solutions for banking, payment, insurance, public administration, healthcare, defense and uniformed services, energy and gas, telecommunications and media, cloud services, and security sectors. It also provides enterprise resource planning solutions and services to micro, small, and mid-sized companies, as well as large enterprises; and business intelligence software and services. The company was formerly known as Softbank S.A. and changed its name to Asseco Poland S.A. in January 2007. Asseco Poland S.A. was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Rzeszów, Poland.
